attributes.action: Demand that First Bus Ltd , either improve hte services that they operate on routes 24/25 in South Bristol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The frequency and timings of the Services 24 and 25 in South Bristol have worsend over the years instead of improving.
The bus fares have imcreased many times above the rate of inflation.
despite complaints from local residents,city councillors and many letters in the local press,First Bus have ignored all complaints.
